homepage.title: Welcome to the School Management System
homepage.description: Manage classes, schedule lessons, and add students and teachers with ease. Track attendance, monitor performance, and share important updates instantly.

chooseuser.adminDesc: Login as an administrator to access the dashboard to manage app data.
chooseuser.studentDesc: Login as a student to explore course materials and assignments.
chooseuser.teacherDesc: Login as a teacher to create courses, assignments, and track student progress.
